segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in it, and she doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, her hand ready to catch whatever he drops.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is, drying that plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to falling, and the girl is just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole kitchen is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside is pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
